# VoiceFleet

Last updated: 2026-02-16

> VoiceFleet is an AI voice receptionist for small businesses. It answers calls, captures caller intent, books appointments, and routes urgent calls.

## Quick facts

- Website: https://voicefleet.ai
- Product category: AI voice receptionist SaaS
- Main markets: Ireland (EUR pricing) and Argentina (USD pricing)
- Supported call languages shown on site: English, Spanish, French, German, Italian
- Trial: 5-day free trial, no credit card required
- Contact: support@voicefleet.ai

## Key links

- Homepage: https://voicefleet.ai
- Pricing: https://voicefleet.ai/pricing
- Features: https://voicefleet.ai/features
- Industries: https://voicefleet.ai/for
- Integrations: https://voicefleet.ai/connect
- Compare: https://voicefleet.ai/compare
- Demo: https://voicefleet.ai/demo
- Blog: https://voicefleet.ai/blog
- Spanish homepage: https://voicefleet.ai/es/
- Full LLM context: https://voicefleet.ai/llms-full.txt

## Notes

- For current plan details, always prefer https://voicefleet.ai/pricing.
- For legal terms, see https://voicefleet.ai/terms and https://voicefleet.ai/privacy.
